about_the_game:
My Darkest Witch is a survival arena game where you take on the role of a mage from the Order of Light, battling waves of infected creatures. Alone, you stand against the abyss of darkness, striving to cleanse the world from the heretical plague. Strengthen your abilities, upgrade your weapons, and enhance your character to withstand increasingly powerful enemies. Each wave becomes more dangerous, testing your survival skills to the limit.



Key features:
  • Endless Waves of Enemies: Face progressively challenging waves of enemies that test your skills and adaptability. Each wave introduces new threats, forcing you to refine your strategy and stay on your toes as you battle against increasingly powerful monsters.
  • Comprehensive Character and Ability Upgrades: Develop your character through a robust progression system that allows you to enhance your magical abilities and defensive skills. Choose your upgrades wisely to build a powerful mage capable of overcoming the toughest foes.
  • Weapon Variety and Customization: Equip your mage with an array of mystical weapons, each with its own strengths and playstyle. Upgrade and customize your arsenal to suit your combat preferences, giving you the edge in battle against the ever-growing hordes.
  • Atmospheric Arenas with Dynamic Combat: Immerse yourself in dark, foreboding arenas where the environment plays a key role in survival. Master the layout, adapt to the changing conditions, and use the surroundings to your advantage as you fight relentless enemies.
  • Strategic Depth and Tactical Gameplay: My Darkest Witch offers more than just fast-paced action. The game encourages strategic planning, from choosing the right upgrades to positioning yourself for maximum effectiveness. Every decision matters as you fight to survive the endless onslaught.
